Zero Carbon








Protein












 






Welcome to

Fermtech






 I founded Fermtech to have an impact on the climate crisis. We have achieved something remarkable: the ability to produce nutritious, delicious protein with zero carbon footprint. Read on to learn more, and get in touch to join us in making food production sustainable. 



Andy Clayton, Biologist, and CEO & Founder of Fermtech 










How

does it work?








 



We use a natural process, with microorganisms used in fermentation since ancient times, to grow protein on grains left over from brewing. 





 



This produces a nutritious, non-GMO, great-tasting protein product that is perfect for use in plant-based foods, like baking, snacks, and plant-based meats. 












NUTRITIOUS. 



DELICIOUS. 



SUSTAINABLE. 


















Our first product is called

Nutriferm.

As well as providing protein, it also has taste-enhancing functions that saves money on other ingredients, reduces carbon footprint, and improves nutritional and health benefits.








Click here to learn more about Nutriferm










 






						Email us					

						to find more product and nutritional information.					


						Email us					















Our vision – by 

2030






Save 1m tons of CO2 GHG equivalents. 



By producing protein for >25,000 tons of animal-free products.

About 







Step into the world of alternative proteins with us. 



 
We are not just solving culinary challenges, but also paving the way for a 

healthier, more sustainable future.






 








 













Meet our

team
















Arun Maheswari
Fermentation Scientist
Arun is an expert on Solid-State Fermentation, he designs and runs our unique fermentation processes.















Shahneawz Khan
Head of R&D
Shahneawz is our senior scientist, he coordinates our R&D and product development.















Andy Clayton
CEO
Our Founder, Andy, is a biologist and experienced entrepreneur who leads the company day to day.















Paul Kollesoff
Chief Commercial Advisor
Paul is an experienced food industry leader,
Former MD of Perfect Day & VP
of Product at Glanbia. He makes deals with customers and partners.















Dave Burgin
Protein Scientist
Dave is an expert protein chemist who designs and runs our protein extractions.















Keith Coleman
Chairman
Keith is an experienced business leader who makes sure that the best interests of the company are served and that we're operating correctly.















Professor Frank Vriesekoop
Chief Technical Advisor
Frank is one of the UK's leading food and fermentation experts. He guides the direction of our R&D and innovation.

Key Benefits 



 


 
High Protein



 
Flavour Enhancement (Salt and Cocoa)

Key Applications 






 
High Protein Seasonings



 
Salt Reduction



 
Cocoa Reduction



 
Plant Based Meats












 
At Fermtech,

revolutionizing the food industry

by harnessing the power of solid-state fermentation to create exceptional ingredients that are not only delicious but also highly nutritious and sustainable.






From crafting mouthwatering flavors to enhancing nutrition

championing sustainability,

we’re your partners in creating delicious solutions that are good for you and the planet. 






By re-purposing waste streams without relying on agricultural inputs, we’re reducing environmental impact while ensuring top-notch quality. Our patent-pending technology simplifies food formulation, making it easier than ever to create products that stand out in

taste, nutrition, and sustainability.
